concept.title: Creating a Cache
concept.shortdesc: The code snippets in this section show cache creation.

conbody.p: When you create your cache, the system automatically connects your process to the server tier. For systems with security enabled, the credentials for a connecting client are authenticated when it creates the cache. See for more information about authenticated connections.
